title: How to Draw a Jungle Vine

steps.headline: Sketch a simple curved line.
steps.description: This will be the basis for the vine's form.

steps.headline: Add lines on either side of the above line.
steps.description: This will add thickness to your vine.

steps.headline: Now draw another line for contrast.
steps.description: This time, make it look like it's curving around your first vine.

steps.headline: Add in thickness for this vine as well.
steps.description: Remember to consider the areas that are covered by the first vine.

steps.headline: Add in leaves.
steps.description: You can also add more vines and any other details that you want.

steps.headline: Add any other detail you'd like.

text: Sketch a simple curved line. This will be the basis for the vine's form. Add lines on either side of the above line. This will add thickness to your vine. Now draw another line for contrast. This time, make it look like it's curving around your first vine. Add in thickness for this vine as well. Remember to consider the areas that are covered by the first vine. Add in leaves. You can also add more vines and any other details that you want. Add any other detail you'd like.  Color it and you're done!
